title: Unveiling Multimessenger Emission from Hidden Cores of Microquasars
summary: Microquasars are radio-emitting X-ray binaries accompanied by relativistic jets. They are established sources of 100~TeV gamma rays and are considered promising candidates for cosmic-ray acceleration.
